bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Marshall Society, also known as the Union Debating Society, was a debating society in Lexington, Virginia around l838-1850s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection's main item is a minute book containing records of the society's debates and business meetings from 1838-1843. It also includes a copy of the society's constitution and a poem written by a member.
